epic.title: Auth and User Profile
epic.request: Add a login page with Google Auth and a user profile settings page
epic.rationale: The request requires two main features: user authentication and user profile management. These are broken down into setting up the core authentication infrastructure first, followed by the UI components for login and profile, which can then be developed in parallel.

tasks.title: Implement Core Authentication Infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up the backend routes for authentication, configure Google OAuth provider, and define necessary user data schemas in the database. This task establishes the foundation for both login and profile features.

tasks.title: Develop Login Page UI with Google Auth Integration
tasks.description: Create the user interface for the login page, including a Google login button. Integrate this UI with the previously established core authentication routes to handle user sign-in.

tasks.title: Build User Profile Settings Page (UI & API)
tasks.description: Develop the user interface for displaying and editing user profile information. Implement API endpoints for fetching and updating user data, ensuring they are protected by the authentication system.

execution_strategy.rationale: Task 1 (Core Auth) is a prerequisite for both Task 2 (Login UI) and Task 3 (Profile Page). However, Task 2 and Task 3 can be developed in parallel once Task 1 is complete, as they primarily involve different UI/API components but rely on the same underlying authentication service.

assumptions_made.choice: An existing web framework is in place (e.g., Next.js, React for frontend, Node.js/Express for backend).
assumptions_made.rationale: This decomposition assumes a standard client-server architecture. Specific implementation details (like database or ORM) will be chosen by the executor.

assumptions_made.choice: Basic user data schema includes at least ID, email, and potentially name/profile picture for Google Auth.
assumptions_made.rationale: This is a minimum viable set for authentication and a basic profile page.
